column4: I'll be going AFK to watch the Obama/Clinton debate.... be back later
RedHeron, it's like watching a boxing match :)
I know... but they have smiles on their faces.
i know!! :) ok going AFK
Depends on the syntax... that's PHP syntax.
ah..... in SQL it's !=
Right, but in PHP, a single "=" means "store the left into the right".
:) well not being a php-person, we just spoke past each other, is all........ :-)
Yep.
You're talking about adding features to IRC???
lol ... who, me?
hey if it were up to me.. I'd run them off independently off large VM's and mirror them
That would be fun to set up. :-)
imagine it ... virtual IP connections with fully transparent TCP stacks mirroring to VMs.... it'd be like RAIDing the IRC :-)
I know... I was thinking about redundancy.
But then the fun part would be tunneling protocols and obtaining a QoS guarantee for IRC relays on every continent. :-)
1990s? It was happening in the 1980's, too... since I was online in 1984.
bah!!!!!!!!  Put Riverbed WAN (WAAS) acceleration devices at the edge routers ...end of QoS
You're footing the bill for those WAAS devices, right?

... of course... I will go to my ATM in fantasyland (where we're building this monument to IRC'dom) and withdraw the funnymoney for it.. or maybe I'll enter next year's WSOP and go all in on a 7/2 offsuit :-)
